I am trying to create a per-class aggregation of the output from the junitc=
ore run-listener, as is done by default in for instance maven surefire-plug=
in.

I have a solution that works, but unfortunately it's a kind of ketchup=
-bottle solution; I have to wait for the entire test-run to finish before I=
 can know which tests have been run for the individual test classes, mostly=
 because I do not have any sensible way to know which tests will be run for=
 a given class.

Anyone have any suggestions as to how to solve this ?

Kri=
stian
